role_description: An Ansible role that installs zoxide, a smarter cd command for your terminal
role_description_full_overview: [zoxide](https://github.com/ajeetdsouza/zoxide) is a blazing fast replacement for your cd command, inspired by z and autojump
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs zoxide, a smarter cd command for your terminal.
